parts.name: Part 1
parts.text: In a bustling makerspace, a young man named [USERNAME] was passionately building all sorts of things. This is part 1.

options.text: Curious to see what [USERNAME] is working on? Continue to part 2.
Interested in the tools and materials he's using? Skip to part 3.

parts.name: Part 2
parts.text: As you approach [USERNAME], you notice he's constructing a futuristic-looking gadget that hums with energy. This is part 2.

options.text: Impressed by the gadget, you decide to ask [USERNAME] about its purpose.

parts.name: Part 3
parts.text: Surveying the makerspace, you see [USERNAME] expertly using a 3D printer and laser cutter. This is part 3.

options.text: Eager to learn more about the tools, you approach [USERNAME]. Go back to part 2.
Intrigued by the 3D printers, you ask [USERNAME] about his role in servicing them.

parts.name: Part 4
parts.text: [USERNAME] smiles warmly and explains, 'Maintaining these 3D printers is crucial for ensuring precision and quality in our creations.' This is part 4.

options.text: Curious about the servicing process, you ask [USERNAME] for a demonstration. Go back to start.
Expressing interest in learning more, you inquire about opportunities to join the makerspace community.

parts.name: Part 5
parts.text: [USERNAME] enthusiastically invites you to participate in a workshop on 3D printer maintenance. This is part 5.

options.text: Excited to join the workshop, you eagerly look forward to learning more. Go back to part 4.
Grateful for the invitation, you express your interest in becoming a regular member of the makerspace.

parts.name: Part 6
parts.text: Welcomed into the makerspace community, you embark on a journey of creativity and innovation alongside [USERNAME]. This is part 6.

options.text: Inspired by the collaborative spirit, you start your own project. Go back to start.
